classes.title: ARCH393
classes.subtitle: Internship in Archaeology.  3-6 Credits.
classes.description: Permission of the instructor and the director of undergraduate studies. Internships combine substantive work experience with an academic project.Gen Ed: EE- Academic Internship.Repeat rules: May be repeated for credit. 12 total credits. 2 total completions.Grading status: Letter grade.

classes.title: ARCH395
classes.subtitle: Research in Archaeology.  1-6 Credits.
classes.description: Permission of the instructor and the director of undergraduate studies. Internships combine substantive work experience with an academic project.Gen Ed: EE- Academic Internship.Repeat rules: May be repeated for credit. 12 total credits. 2 total completions.Grading status: Letter grade.

classes.title: ARCH395
classes.subtitle: Research in Archaeology.  1-6 Credits.
classes.description: Permission of the instructor. For students who wish to participate in laboratory or field research programs. May be taken twice.Repeat rules: May be repeated for credit. 12 total credits. 2 total completions.Grading status: Letter grade.

classes.title: ARCH396
classes.subtitle: Independent Study in Archaeology.  1-6 Credits.
classes.description: Permission of the instructor. For students who wish to participate in laboratory or field research programs. May be taken twice.Repeat rules: May be repeated for credit. 12 total credits. 2 total completions.Grading status: Letter grade.

classes.title: ARCH396
classes.subtitle: Independent Study in Archaeology.  1-6 Credits.
classes.description: Permission of the instructor. Special reading and research in archaeology under the supervision of a selected instructor. May be taken twice.Repeat rules: May be repeated for credit. 12 total credits. 2 total completions.Grading status: Letter grade.

classes.title: ARCH691H
classes.subtitle: Seniors Honors Thesis, Part 1.  3 Credits.
classes.description: Permission of the instructor. Special reading and research in archaeology under the supervision of a selected instructor. May be taken twice.Repeat rules: May be repeated for credit. 12 total credits. 2 total completions.Grading status: Letter grade.

classes.title: ARCH691H
classes.subtitle: Seniors Honors Thesis, Part 1.  3 Credits.
classes.description: Permission of the instructor. Restricted to senior honors candidates. First semester of senior honors thesis. Independent research under the direction of an archaeology curriculum faculty member.Gen Ed: EE- Mentored Research.Grading status: Letter grade.

classes.title: ARCH692H
classes.subtitle: Senior Honors Thesis, Part 2.  3 Credits.
classes.description: Permission of the instructor. Restricted to senior honors candidates. First semester of senior honors thesis. Independent research under the direction of an archaeology curriculum faculty member.Gen Ed: EE- Mentored Research.Grading status: Letter grade.

classes.title: ARCH692H
classes.subtitle: Senior Honors Thesis, Part 2.  3 Credits.
classes.description: Permission of the instructor. Restricted to senior honors candidates. Second semester of senior honors thesis. Independent research under the direction of an archaeology curriculum faculty member.Gen Ed: EE- Mentored Research.Grading status: Letter grade.
